name: claude-cowork-plugins-for-dobbies
description: A curated marketplace of Claude Cowork plugins for academic research â€” search papers, manage references, and export citations.

plugins.name: scopus-plugin

plugins.name: crossref-plugin

plugins.name: korea-patent-plugin
